backend/main.mo: Backend Motoko canister implementing user profiles, leadership word submissions with counting, and resilient leadership activity submissions with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a requirement to add and render an uploaded QR code image on the Slides page.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of pre-generated summaries for multiple frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, content, and activity workflows.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, React Query client, and top-level providers.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Shared layout component providing navigation, authentication controls, and mobile menu wrapping page content.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipWordPa: Component displaying top leadership word counts with optional polling and a bar-style visualization.
frontend/src/components/MicroSolutionsCo: Displays community micro‑solutions with polling, loading states, and formatted challenge details.
frontend/src/components/PageSection.tsx: Provides a styled layout wrapper for page sections with configurable classes.
frontend/src/components/SignInGate.tsx: Blocks access until the user signs in via Internet Identity, showing a login prompt if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/content/movieReferences.ts: Exports a list of movie and film‑series citations used in activities and reference pages.
frontend/src/content/proposalContent.ts: Defines structured proposal metadata and text content including title, abstracts, and learning outcomes.
frontend/src/content/references.ts: Exports the full ordered list of academic reference entries with keys and formatted citation text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and submitting leadership words and resilient leadership activities, including optimistic cache updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, configures React Query, and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitiesPage.tsx: Displays an overview of interactive activities with descriptions and links to Activity 1 and 2.
frontend/src/pages/Activity1LeadershipWo: Handles Activity 1 form submission, validation, affirmation generation, and quote retrieval.
frontend/src/pages/Activity2ResilientLea: Manages Activity 2 inputs, submission, validation generation, and retrieval of related quotes.
frontend/src/pages/BioPage.tsx: Renders the author's bio, background, and external profile links.
frontend/src/pages/LeadershipBoardPage.t: Shows community leadership word trends and shared micro-solutions with live polling.
Displays learning outcomes using data from proposalContent, rendering each as a styled card.
frontend/src/pages/MovieReferencesPage.t: Shows a list of movie references from movieReferences with simple styled containers.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Renders a hero banner, abstract content, and quick navigation links using proposalContent.
frontend/src/pages/ReferencesPage.tsx: Lists academic references from REFERENCES as styled reference blocks.
frontend/src/pages/SessionOutlinePage.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SlidesPage.tsx: Displays a Slides header and an image containing a QR code.
frontend/src/pages/TakeawaysPage.tsx: Shows key takeaways from proposalContent, each with title and description.
frontend/src/utils/activity1Affirmations: Generates affirmations and selects references based on leadership word inputs and predefined templates.
frontend/src/utils/activity2Validation.t: Detects themes from user inputs, selects matching references, and generates validation messages.
Maps UI challenge type keys to backend ChallengeType enum values.
frontend/src/utils/isVillainousInput.ts: Checks text for negative or harmful language using keyword and phrase matching.
frontend/src/utils/quoteFormatting.ts: Converts backend QuoteGenre enum values into readable franchise names.
frontend/src/utils/referenceSelection.ts: Validates reference formatting and selects valid references deterministically or randomly as needed.
frontend/src/utils/starWarsQuotes.ts: Defines a StarWarsQuote type, a list of predefined quotes, and a deterministic quote selector.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, and clear URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Maps various error types and messages to concise user-facing error strings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, features, and pending requests for adding a QR code image to Slides.
